meanings.definition: Extremely selective or particular in making choices.
meanings.sent1: She is the choosiest eater I know, always picking out the vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The choosiest customers only buy products with the highest quality.
meanings.sent3: Even the choosiest cat couldn't find a mouse to play with in that empty room.
meanings.sent4: His choosiest taste in music led him to discover a hidden gem of a band.
meanings.sent5: The choosiest shoppers spent hours comparing prices before making a decision.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to be very selective in choosing.
meanings.sent1: The choosiest students always sit in the front row to focus better.
meanings.sent2: Being the choosiest member of the group, she carefully selected the perfect gift.
meanings.sent3: The choosiest movie buff in town never misses a film festival.
meanings.sent4: Her choosiest attitude towards fashion made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The choosiest bookworms spend hours browsing through bookstores to find the best reads.
